A corporate artificial intelligence simulator.

The Visioneer Edition includes the full game, the Park Beyond: Annual Pass, as well as its Coaster Car Bonus, and Zombeyond Impossification Set.

The Ultimate Edition includes:

JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R brings Hirohiko Araki's masterpiece to life in fighting game form!

Battle with 50 colorful characters from the world of JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, wielding Stands, Hamon, and more!
See how characters who could never meet in the story interact when they come face to face!

name: Kung Fu Fighting
description:
Welcome to the world of Martial Arts. It is the arcade Kung Fu fight games to enjoy martial arts games game-play, fighting animations, special effects, thrilling sounds, and real fighting styles.

Start rivalry by choosing a fighter to conquer the battle. Hold your nerves against the opponent's brilliant moves and keep an eye on every move. Use techniques like taekwondo, Muay Thai, Kung Fu, boxing, and others, to show your top-level fighting skills defeat your rivals. With stunning visual and fighting moves, you will enjoy it a lot.

name: Crime Files Bundle
description:
This bundle includes:

Ghost Files: The Face of Guilt - Lead a police investigation in the afterlife!

Ghost Files: Memory of a Crime - Stop a series of terrible crimes!

Crime Secrets: Crimson Lily - Stop the mysterious killer!

name: Donuts in Space
description: Donuts in Space is an arcade shooter where the player destroys donut meteors and alien ships. Survive and collect powerups as you blast your way through a tasty galactic assault.

name: New Lands 2
description:
See what it’s like to be a farmer and maker of sweet treats. Grow cocoa trees, build mills and make squirrel houses. Decorate your own farmhouse. The farther you go into the new lands, the more varied your tasks will be and the harder they’ll be to complete.
Work your new lands and become the best maker of sweet treats around in new time management game New Lands 2!

name: Robo Ret
description: Robo Ret is a 2D action platformer game where the player takes on the role of a robot fighting against other robot bosses.The player's main weapon is a cannon arm, which they use to shoot at the enemy bosses. The goal of the game is to defeat all of the bosses.

name: S Lanes
description:
S Lanes is a fast-paced one-button game.

You are constantly moving between the four lanes on the left side of the screen. Your goal is to shoot enemies that are coming from the right to keep them from reaching the lanes. Hold a button to shoot and to move forward towards the enemies. Collect the coins that enemies drop after you destroy them to score points.

The game is over when any enemy reaches any of the lanes.

name: Power The Light
description:
Light, we need it to see and to live, the lights have all gone out and it is now up to you to bring them back.

Can you power the lights?

name: Funny Alphabet
description: Learn the first letters with us in our game Funny Alphabet, where your child have to guess the correct letter to the correct image.

name: Minecraft: Toy Story Mash-up
description: Open up the toy box! Woody, Buzz, Bo Peep and many of your favorite toys come to life in this oversized Mash-up based on all the Toy Story movies! To infinity and beyond!

name: War Thunder: M1 KVT Pack
description: This Pack includes: M1 KVT (Rank 6 USA);Premium account for 15 days;2000 Golden Eagles.

name: War Thunder: Su-39 Pack
description: This Pack includes: Su-39 (Rank 7 USSR);Premium account for 20 days;2500 Golden Eagles.

name: Dust and Aliens
description: Play a space cowboy as he travels to an alien-filled arena, traversing the various game rooms to achieve the highest possible score and challenge the ultimate Dust and Aliens enemy!

name: Trainz Plus DLC: Pro Train DB Class 52
description: The Deutsche Reichsbahn's Class 52 is a German steam locomotive built in large numbers during the Second World War. It was the most produced type of the so-called Kriegslokomotiven or Kriegsloks (war locomotives). This pack features the DB Class 52 steam loco & tube tender, and a detailed cab view!

name: Trainz 2019 DLC: Pro Train DB Class 52
description: The Deutsche Reichsbahn's Class 52 is a German steam locomotive built in large numbers during the Second World War. It was the most produced type of the so-called Kriegslokomotiven or Kriegsloks (war locomotives). This pack features the DB Class 52 steam loco & tube tender, and a detailed cab view!

name: Trainz 2022 DLC: Pro Train DB Class 52
description: The Deutsche Reichsbahn's Class 52 is a German steam locomotive built in large numbers during the Second World War. It was the most produced type of the so-called Kriegslokomotiven or Kriegsloks (war locomotives). This pack features the DB Class 52 steam loco & tube tender, and a detailed cab view!

name: EIsland Hop
description: You are trapped in a bay surrounded by rocks. You must find and collect all the portal shards scattered across different islands to gain the chance to escape! Are you able to rebuild the portal in time, or will you stay trapped forever?

name: Mystical Mixing: Arcane Edition
description:
Enter a world of magic and wonder with Mystical Mixing.
Pour the potion into the cauldron, throw in the clover, bone and feather, stir and voila - you have a cute Mixie!

Combine other ingredients to create Mixies with different features: winged, horned, spotted, furry... the possibilities are endless.

name: Railway Empire 2: Nintendo Switch Edition
description: In Railway Empire 2 – Nintendo Switch Edition, take over a small railway company in the early 1800s, grow it into the largest railway company of the continent and outsmart your competitors as you connect cities and companies with an ever-expanding network of rail lines, bridges, and tunnels. Railway Empire 2 features bigger, more detailed and lively maps than ever before, focusing on iconic regions of the USA and Europe. Improved track construction helps you focus on the important decisions as you drive the economy and help the growth of the cities. Signals are placed automatically, bridges can hold more than 4 tracks and the expandable train stations can now have up to 8 tracks.

name: Retro Rollers Bundle
description:
This bundle includes all the "hedge-like" games from developer Spicy Gyro Games:
Panic Porcupine and Polyroll!

name: Bus Tycoon Night and Day
description: Start building your passenger bus transport empire between cities all night and day! Bus Tycoon Night and Day is a passenger transport tycoon game.

name: Amaze! Time Attack Edition
description:
Lets pop & move the ball and paint - you’ve got to color and paint your way across the AMAZE maze puzzles.

Watch out! AMAZE gets harder as you play, color and paint the maze, and fill in puzzles!

Painting the maze puzzles sounds easy, but you have to be super strategic to color and fill every square.

name: Minecraft: DuckTales
description: Discover treasure and trouble at every turn in the DuckTales Adventure Map! From McDuck Manor to Mount Neverrest, zoom from adventure to legendary puzzles in the Sun Chaser, and deposit your riches at The Money Bin! Solve a mystery or rewrite history as Huey, Dewey, Louie, Webby, and other Duckburg citizens. Life is like a hurricane in the DuckTales Adventure Map! WOO-OO!

name: Venatur
description: Venatur is a Online PVPVE first person shooter, extract and survive, loot valuable items, craft better equipment, complete 3 story lines quests.

name: The Crew: Motorfest - Gold Edition
description:
Gold Edition includes the game, the Year 1 Pass, and up to three days of early access to the game!

Pre-purchase to get the Liberty Walk Pack, including the Toyota GR Supra 2021 LBWK Edition.

Welcome to Motorfest, the ultimate driving experience! Explore the vibrant open world of the island of O'ahu in Hawaii as you compete in intense races, themed events, and much more!

name: Scribble It!: Premium Edition
description:
This DLC unlocks the entire functionality of Scribble It!

- All word packages from our amazing community can be used in private lobbies,
- All event game modes can be played in private lobbies with your friends.
- Unlocks 30 new avatars.
- Unlocks 5 new theme colors

name: Dr. Virus
description: Dr. Virus is a captivating puzzle game where players must strategically arrange colored viruses to create chains and eliminate them from the board. With challenging levels and addictive gameplay, it offers a thrilling experience of virus-busting fun.

name: Eternights: Deluxe Edition
description: Immerse yourself into the world of Eternights with the Deluxe Edition, including the base game, the official digital artbook, revealing insights into the development of Eternights, and the official digital soundtrack featuring over 30 tracks composed by Spencer Bambrick.

name: Evalina The Sorceress
description: Evalina is a dark atmospheric puzzle game

name: Mall of Mayhem: All Skins Pack
description: Suit up for more mayhem with all of the skins in the game!

name: Bottle: Pilgrim Redux
description: Bottle: Pilgrim is a story of loss, regret and redemption, which reminds us that while we cannot change the things we have done, we can always learn from our mistakes.

name: CoopValor 2056: All Unlimited Edition
description: Unlock the entire game, you will have no limitations of any kind. All novelties will be unlimited and forever!

name: Super Mario Fallen Stars
description:
Super Mario Fallen Stars is a demo made by Skillux which was never completed. The game features four colorful levels and 45 stars.

All three Cap Switches are sitting out in the open in the overworld. The Toad in the overworld refers to Bowser's Ice Mountain as "Bowser's Lair" but Bowser does not make an appearance in this game.

name: Childhood Homes: And Why We Hate Them
description:
Welcome back.

After over a decade, you return home.

name: Rotten Dinner
description:
It's such a beautiful evening. Won't you share it with me over a lovely dinner?
What is the main course, my sweetheart? Oh, it's a secret...

name: Mech Arena
description:
Mech Arena is a fast-paced PvP mech shooter with competitive mayhem for everyone.

Choose from dozens of Weapons and Mechs with special abilities for endless combinations. Fight with friends or compete in a global arena of players, maps, and modes.

Take on the world in the most explosive, fun, and chaotic sport the future has to offer

name: Love & Dehumanization
description: This is an adult visual novel that takes place in a fantasy RPG world. A girl willingly becomes a monster and is subject to brutal violence. Though she doesn't realize it, hope is somehow waiting on the other side of this cruelty.

name: My Therapist is a Futanari
description: It feels like your life isn't going anywhere--like there's some kind of mental block. You take the first step towards making an improvement and set up an appointment with a therapist in your local area.

name: Angry Zombies 2
description: Strategy game of zombification spreading for iOS.

name: Xenoblade Chronicles 2 and Xenoblade Chronicles 2 Expansion Pass Bundle
description:
Lost in a sea of clouds, entire civilizations rest on the backs of Titans. As the giant beasts march toward death, the last hope is a scavenger named Rex—and Pyra, a living weapon known as a Blade. Can you find the fabled paradise she calls home? Command a group of Blades and lead them to countless strategic victories before the world ends. Purchase this bundle to own both Xenoblade Chronicles 2 and the Expansion Pass.

With the Xenoblade Chronicles 2 Expansion Pass, you’ll gain access to some titanic new content, including new Rare Blades such as Shulk and Fiora, bonus items, new quests, Challenge Battle mode, and the new stand-alone game, Xenoblade Chronicles 2: Torna ~ The Golden Country!

name: Awesome Eats
description: Sort, stack, pack and plate a rainbow of fresh-from-the-garden foods! And now recycle items after lunch!

name: Beat the Boss
description: Beat up your boss with this game! We know how stupid and mean they can be. Stand up for yourself, give them what they deserve. Bazooka right in the face! You can punch, burn, stab, slap, egg them and much more!!

name: Monster Battle
description: Monster Battle is retro, monster shooter where the player eliminates monsters and arcade style bosses. Collect power-ups while vanquishing foes in 12 unique levels.

name: Jolly
description: Welcome to Jolly's Fantasy World! Eat our food or plan a party, Jolly's Fantasy World is the place to go! Starring everyone's favorite bee, Jolly! People just can't get enough of Jolly and his gang. Work hours are now extended! Can you survive five nights?

name: Jolly 2
description:
After the closing of Freddy Fazbear's Pizza in 1985, the animatronics are being shipped as cargo to another location where it will hopefully be used for good.

You're guarding the cargo.

name: V.V.L. 2
description: Sin descripción

name: ArcRacer
description: ArcRacer is a fast-paced, aggressive, and stylistic anti-gravity racer. Inspired by classic series such as F-Zero and WipEout, ArcRacer aims to provide a fresh new challenge for genre veterans, while also creating an accessible and engaging experience for newcomers.

name: Crixus: Life of free Gladiator
description: Crixus is a single-player life simulator, Ludus manager, and a hack-and-slash game based in ancient Rome. You are Gladiator and Ludus Manager. Fight in the arena, manage your gladiator school and roam the fictional city. Win tournaments and become the most famous Ludus.

name: Jolly 4
description:
The final chapter of the JOLLY series. You have been tasked to work in a facility to guard a rebranded version of the beloved animatronics of Jolly Entertainment. However, you aren’t just here for the paycheck. You have a greater purpose here…stay the course.
One goal, four ways to end it.

name: Don't Drop the Controller: Chapter 2
description: A game where you don't drop the controller.

name: Monkey Ascend!
description: Monkey Ascend! is a small survival game where you stay on bamboos and kick down evil creatures (harmless insects) that can somehow drag you down!

name: Blur 2
description: Blur 2 was a planned sequel to Blur. The game was cancelled due to Bizarre Creations' closure in February 2011. Three prototypes have been dumped, dated August 31, November 9, and November 10, 2010.

name: Bot.vinnik Chess: Combination Lessons
description: Engage with BOT.vinnik, a witty Soviet AI chess instructor! His sharp humor and rigorous challenges will mold you into a pro. Dive into visually rich chess theories and intricate puzzles, all designed to boost your chess skills. Ready for the challenge?

name: Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria Tycoon
description: Live your pizzeria dreams in this FNaF Pizzeria Tycoon game!

name: Bot.vinnik Chess: Late USSR Championships
description: Miss me already, comrade? A wise human once said: "Attackers may sometimes regret bad moves, but it is much worse to forever regret an opportunity you allowed to pass you by." So don't let this one pass! Enroll Now and be prepared to learn from the real masters!

name: Bot.vinnik Chess: Mid-Century USSR Championships
description: We meet again, chess enthusiast comrade! If chess knowledge is what you seek, you have come to the right place. Let's see if you are worthy of standing on the shoulders of the soviet giants!

name: Bot.vinnik Chess: Winning Patterns
description: Attention, comrade! Registrations are open once again! The players submitted to my previous training showed significant improvement in chess skills when compared to the rest of the population, even the lazy ones. So what are you waiting for?? Enroll NOW by clicking on the purchase button!!

name: Volcania Peaks
description: Volcania Peaks is a strange area, filled to the brim with lava, smoke and fire. And there's been some unusual events occurring there. In an offer to help put a stop to this sudden madness, you decide to take a step in...

name: Ambien
description: Ambien is an Omori mod that focuses on expanding and exploring Black Space 2, with new endings.

name: Minecraft: Frozen
description: Welcome to Arendelle, home of Anna, Elsa, Olaf and friends. Adventure past the Ice Palace and into the unknown in this Frozen themed world! Play mini-games and complete puzzles to earn rewards, then head back to decorate the castle, all while enjoying your favorite Frozen songs!

name: Tsukihime: Fool's Errand
description: A few months after the end of Tsukihime, life at the Tohno mansion has more or less returned to normal. Akiha is busy with school and managing the Tohno estate, Ciel gives Shiki regular after-school lessons to help him catch up on everything he missed, Hisui is ever happy to await Shiki-sama at the front door, Kohaku is as cheerful and crazy as ever and Arcueid has finally gotten firmly in touch with her feline side. Surely, this can't go on like this for long...

name: Gramik Paint Roller
description: Sin descripción

name: Resident Evil Revelations 2 - Season Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: Xmas Boom
description:
Fulfillment of all wishes in the New Year!
A very angry witch Gruzona does not like Christmas. On the eve of it, witch turned all the gifts in malicious green monsters and now no one will receive gifts for Christmas. Santa's team of helpers moves forward to remove the spell all the presents before Christmas. Just hurry up, we need your help...

name: The Envolution of Wandaland
description: A minimal puzzle game, combine the cells and then piece together various creatures

name: Revolt Legion VR
description: The game story is set in a country with an authoritarian government, where the people are oppressed. As a general of the country, in order to save the people, you chose an uprising, started arming yourself, formed a team, and liberated one city after another.

name: Starship Traders MMO
description: A sci-fi sandbox MMO where players explore galaxies, hunt aliens, and form corporations to combine forces for larger opportunities.

name: BloodDome Classic
description: The Bullet Heaven arcade classic that started it all! Create unique builds, kill ever-growing hordes of contestants and beat your friends' high scores in the retro-futuristic gladiator arena BloodDome.

name: Mechanics
description: Creatively use a combination of mechanics to get to the end of the level in this isometric puzzle game.

name: Be King
description: Be king is a decision taking game, and you can loose if you take the wrong decisions! Taking and making the right decisions is what you need to ensure you keep increasing your empire in size, and in power!

name: Another Day
description: Ivan sets out for the abandoned hospital in the town of Olkhov, where his brother Tolya disappeared after witnessing something horrifying, causing him to stop communicating and eventually vanish.

name: Neon Fantasy: Birds
description: Neon Fantasy: Birds is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: Slimegeon
description: Slimegeon is a 3D first person roguelike dungeon-crawler game where the player runs through dungeons and possesses defeated enemies to use their abilities and takedown bosses to continue to the next floor. Through the dungeon, the player can level up the unique skill trees for each enemy.

name: Furries & Scalies & Bears OH MY! 2: Return to Kale Bay - Beyond the Monster Sea
description: Interact with two new characters and dive deeper into the mysteries of Kale Bay!

name: Army of Tentacles: (Not) A Cthulhu Dating Sim 2 - DLC 2
description: A free DLC that adds some extra EXP.

name: Revenge of Noxi
description: Play as the ultimate ninja badass Noxi using magic, sword and shurikens to fight off an army of monsters and save your loved one. Bring Noxi to the top floor of her ruined home over dangerous terrain with athletic jumps, flips, sprints and slides

name: Missiles Away
description: Humanity faces its darkest hour as an alien force launches a relentless invasion. As a skilled pilot, you must take control of a powerful combat helicopter and engage in a fast-paced, high-octane first-person shooter experience.

name: Grapple Gum
description: Grapple Gum is an award winning SlingShot-Action-Platformer in which you play as a little pink piece of gum and grapple across moving objects. It's a neat mix of mechanics as you can float through the space, hitch a ride by hooking on the various platforms, and slingshot your way from one piece to another while also shooting at all kinds of targets, including big bosses and the little various sooty critters nibbling at your toes.

name: Loopy Blocks
description:
Only 99 cents for a limited amount of time.
34 levels, and an estimated 2 1/2 hours of gameplay.
Huge updates every month or so, doubling, even tripling gameplay!

name: Z Line
description: Swipe your finger left or right to move the spaceship and stay inside the vortex while you fly throughout the space.

name: Fall of Porcupine: Save the World Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Such Ninja
description: Such Ninja is a relentless runner. Master the art of the ninja by dodging an endless storm of shurikens.

name: Knight Girl: Match 3 Puzzle
description:
The Knight Girl is a match-3 puzzle game from the developers of popular Tap the Frog series.
On your way, you will meet colorful characters that will share with you their secrets of happiness. Various game bonuses and features allow for a fresh look at the classic match-3 gameplay.

name: The Rainbowers
description: The Rainbowers is a funny and challenging puzzle game about a cute little monster Family who inhabited the Rainbow Valley and feasted upon delicious color drops, oozing from the glorious Rainbow. One day furious tornado came and destroyed the Rainbow and scattered its drops all over the valley.

name: Slash of Sword 2
description:
You were accused of a crime you did not commit and were sent to fight in the arena as punishment. Bloody and tactical fights for survival of varying complexity with many rivals await you. Try to learn skills to become more proficient, as well as explore locations and interact with characters to achieve justice!
Will you try to make decisions about whether to help a wounded man who was recently a bandit and robbed ordinary travelers? Whether to tell the owner about the treasure you found? Or maybe whether to let the girl go with the robber who kidnapped her, or deal with him and return the girl to her father? You decide…

name: NoCanNoTap
description:
1.Tap to remove Woods as many as possible.
2.Keep thing(wood/stone/sponge) below the Role.
3.Wait green bar to be full and You Win!

name: Decurse: A New Magic Farming Game
description: Journey to a magical sparkly island where pandas, wizards, mermaids are just the beginning! Can you reverse the curse with the power of smiles and rainbows to bring happiness to the villagers?

name: Angel Legion: Oriental - Purple
description: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: Reverie
description: Can emptiness be an object? Reverie is a narrative-driven puzzle platformer about manipulating empty space. Grab and move empty space to solve puzzles in interesting ways!

name: Topic Twister
description:
Make the twister spin to get a letter! You'll have 60 seconds to find a word for each of the 5 categories.
From the creators of Trivia Crack and Aworded Crack, a mobile version of the classic game is now here for your entertainment. Think on your feet and be quick to respond to win. Play games, win rewards and challenge the community.

name: Word Whisper
description:
Word Whisper is a New Word Puzzle,Word Finder,Spelling game. Where you have to Swipe Letters and Pictures to complete words, challenge your self and complete Inspirational Quotes about Life,Weird Facts and Trivia .
It is a brain teaser and at the same time educational.
For hint you can check the pop up text to see which words needs to be filled to complete the text.

name: Def Leppard: Let's Rock It!
description:
Welcome to Def Leppard's "Let’s Rock It!" - Step into the shoes of Bethany, an up-and-coming rocker on the rise to stardom with the help of the legendary Def Leppard.
Collect stylish clothes and new musical instruments, conquer social media, and make your way to the top of the charts as you progress through levels & solve puzzles using match-3 combinations!

name: Words Collide
description: Play by yourself or cooperatively with friends. Relax in Zen Mode, or challenge yourself with Adventure Mode. Carefully construct combos to achieve high scores! Discover and learn new words using our in game dictionary. Arrange letters to spell words; your friends can reuse your words to spell bigger words. Earn coins to unlock upgrades like extra letters, hints and combos. Start playing Words Collide today!

name: Block and Save
description:
In this game, your goal is simple : Drag and move your polygons/circles, protect the targets from being knocked out by computer!
You need to win to unlock next stage. Besides winning, you may also target to get more scores : increase the time elapsed at the game, let computer's polygons/circles rush out of arena, or keep your polygons/circles on arena safely!

name: Pokémon 2000 Adventure Game
description:
Pokémon 2000 Adventure Game was an online game developed by Cyberworld International Corporation as a tie-in to Pokémon the Movie 2000. It utilized Cyberworld's proprietary QBORG technology to display 2.5D environments in a specialized browser. According to Neil Marshall, who served as a programmer and technical director for the project, the game was only available for a month before being pulled due to "a contract dispute". However, at least one file existed as late as 2003, and the front page of the game existed as late as 2009 according to Wayback Machine.

The game had the player set their name, choose a Pokémon team, and select difficulty. The player would navigate a 2.5D environment, with web pages displayed on a side panel allowing for further interaction with the game world. The goal of the game was to travel to three islands, each guarded by one of the three legendary bird Pokémon, Moltres, Zapdos, and Articuno, and retrieve an Ancient Sphere from each island.

name: War 2: Victory
description: Based on the hit WAR2 browser game with 3,000,000 monthly active users across multiple platforms, the FREE MMO strategy game War 2 Victory now lands on App Store. Seek honor and glory in the battlefields of WWII. Take charge of either Allied or Axis forces and build a lone outpost into a mighty war machine.

name: Mayority
description:
Hey, cool news! The elections are over and you are the new mayor of Mayority! But this is just the beginning of your success story. The residents of Mayority all have different ideas about what their perfect city should look like. Your challenge is to consider all their needs and make decisions that are fair for everyone. Are you ready for this task? Then let's get started!
With Mayority, you will experience what happens when things are not fair. Residents become angry, they protest, and when they are totally frustrated, they leave the city. This causes the city to lose tax revenue and you lose voters.

name: IsoWords
description: IsoWords is the iPhone's first word search game wrapped onto a cube. Connect letters to form words, but watch out! The third time a letter is used its cube will be removed!

name: Bright Reappear
description:
On the continent of Oslo, humans and creatures live peaceful and tranquil lives. Peace has lasted for thousands of years here. Immersed in peace, humans and creatures gradually forget the existence of darkness. And darkness quietly spreads.
The dark queen, once defeated by humans, has returned, leading a large army of darkness from the depths of hell to reappear in the world. The even more powerful darkness is invincible, and the northern human army has already been defeated, with the city defense lost. The dark army has moved south and is about to occupy the entire Oslo continent.
The belated humans and creatures rise up to fight back, but is there still a chance? Currently, the Oslo continent has been shrouded in darkness. Will light ever return?
This is a role-playing (RPG) game. As a player, you play as a hero fighting for the light of the Oslo continent. Okay! This is a classic story of a hero saving the world. But everyone has a dream of becoming a hero in their heart, and I hope you can experience it here.
Let's fight for the light together!

name: War General: Multiplayer Rank
description:
Lead your troops to victory in epic battles against opponents in "War General - Multiplayer Rank"! As a war general, you'll need to strategize and plan your attacks carefully to outsmart your opponents and emerge victorious.
With a variety of soldiers, weapons, and military vehicles at your disposal, you can customize your army to suit your playstyle and take on any challenge that comes your way. Choose your spawning position and deploy your troops across the battlefield, taking down enemy soldiers, towers, and walls while protecting your own base from attack.
Each victory earns you in-game currency that you can use to upgrade your soldiers and equipment, making them even more powerful for your next battle. But that's not all – winning games also earns you rank points that can help you climb the ranks and earn even greater rewards!

name: CyberWave Survivor
description:
CyberWave Survivor, the survival space shooter with minimalistic gameplay and tough choices through ship upgrades!!
Defend the cyber planets from waves of enemy ships, Shmup style!! Tracking missiles, boss ships and more..
Every wave ends which allows for decisions for upgrading the ship, if currency allows..

name: B-17 Flying Fortress: Bombers in Action
description: Sin descripción

name: Closed Circuit
description: A port of Closed Circuit for Playdate

name: Pokémon Tower Battle
description:
Pokémon Tower Battle is a spin-off Pokémon game on Facebook Gaming developed by Bombay Play. It was released worldwide on December 23, 2019 and is available in four languages: English, Indonesian, Thai, and Traditional Chinese.

The game is hosted on Facebook's servers, either on the website or the app. In-game, players take turns placing down Pokémon artwork to build a tower. The game ends when one person knocks over one of the Pokémon on the tower, prompting the other as the winner. In addition, a Pokémon can be switched out for another with a Poké Ball, which can be acquired by watching advertisements. There also are Ultra Balls, which have the chance to hold rare Pokémon, and Master Balls, which guarantee a rare Pokémon on use. These can also be obtained by watching ads, though are distributed randomly by watching videos in a row.

The game keeps track of the highest stack a player has built, allowing them to share it online through Facebook if they so choose. The game also has ranked seasons, allowing users to gain rewards through ranks by continuously playing the game before the season ends and said rank is reset.

name: Layers of Fear: Deluxe Edition
description:
- The Layers of Fear (game)
- Original Soundtrack (digital)
- The Art of Layers of Fear

name: Tales & Dragons: Merge Puzzle
description: Sin descripción

name: ASMR Slicing
description:
Choose your favorite cutting tool no matter if it's a playing card, flosser or just a simple kitchen knife. Just cut, cut, cut and experience those satisfying ASMR
sounds! Slice a variety of colorful objects made of kinetic sand in the shapes of food, toys, buildings, everyday objects and ordinary cubes or blocks!

Need to raise the difficulty level a bit? Turn on the challenge mode! Cut off the right weight, divide an object into a given number of parts, cut an item perfectly in half, or find things hidden inside!

name: Tower Color
description: Sin descripción

name: Netlooter
description: Netlooter is a single-player offline FPS. Download the game and enjoy action-packed gameplay. Designed from the ground up for the mobile platform. From slow-motion bullet dives to intuitive controls, Netlooter is loaded with powerful weapons.

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Party Popteenies Surprise
