name: FPS Commando Gun Shooting Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Castle Burn
description:
Welcome to Castle Burn, the mobile fantasy RTS game with competitive PvP battles!
Fire Pillars, Cannon Towers, Vikings, Dragons, use whatever you want to fight alongside great Heroes to burn down your enemy's castle!

name: Crazy Golf Arcade Game
description:
Crazy Golf is a cool mini golf game , mix between Golf ball and arcade classic.
Drive the ball through goals in a fast paced physic based environment.

name: Joy Desk
description:
The Joy Desk app is the fun, quirky, new game that actually tests your smarts!
The app recreates those boring memo pads you get at work but you won’t be reading these pads! Memo pads have items and objects on them for you to play with – lines, balls, and stars.
The object of the game is to use your ball and get all the stars. Turn, move, rotate the memo pads and the ball will fall to catch the stars. Collect all the stars and to move through the levels.
Sounds easy, right? Well, Joy Desk is for only the smartest players.
Lines create restrictions, forcing players to think about where they will move the memo pads to collect the stars all at once.
Levels get progressively more difficult, forcing players to be thoughtful.
Joy Desk also comes with pass cards so if you’re unsure of how to solve the puzzles, then use the pass cards to get past the more difficult puzzle levels.
Pass cards are super helpful in a clinch - use them when you feel stumped!
You get 5 free keys to open a walkthrough of each level.
After you used up all the free keys, you can buy them through in-app purchasing.
What if you used up all the free keys and you don't have enough money to buy one?
Then the bonus game will solve you problem. If you win the game, you get one bonus key!!

name: Sushi Mushi
description: Love to play with your food?...

name: Popstar
description: Once you pop, you can't stop!

name: Beat Boss
description: Ever get tired of listening to your boss at work? Ever get so mad you wish you could punch him silly? Well, now you CAN with this fun game Beat Your Boss! It's been a long day, you're ready to go home, and this guy just won't leave you alone! So take your aggressions out on the boss and don't actually get fired from your job!

name: Playbook: Stories with Choices
description: You will get compelling interactive stories about the supernatural, betrayal, love, and friendship which will take you to many different endings. Make decisions that really matter and along the way, find hidden objects, assemble torn pictures, look for differences between pictures, or pick a lock to open the secret drawer. The best collection of story games with choices is waiting for you! Download Playbook: Interactive Story Games today and enjoy a storytelling masterpiece.

name: Nations Cup Cricket 2019
description:
Nations Cup Cricket 2019 is the follow up to last year's fan favourite Village Cricket, and allows you to bat and bowl your way across the cricketing world in pursuit of glory! Did you miss out on tickets to the World Cup? Then play this instead!
Take on 50 teams from as far and wide as the Philippines, Bermuda, Kenya, India, and greatest-team-in-the-world England. Laugh as you beat some blokes from Australia trying to cheat their way to the top!

name: Tanked!
description:
Come and join the tank revolution and climb the ladder to become the best tank commander around!
Play with your friends and see who can kill the most tanks. Upgrade your tank with the best upgrades to defeat the enemy tanks faster. Add on the coolest mods from mines to plant around the map to make it hard for enemy tanks to get around, stealth-mode packs to hide away from enemy tanks and to sneak up on them, machine guns to shoot down the enemy tank fast, and many more to come.
With all these upgrades and mods you should be the best tank commander out there and you will be able to dominate the tank field.

name: Animals & Fairy Tales Puzzles
description:
The perfect puzzle collection for boys and girls with exclusive high-quality graphics and illustrations. It has everything a kid wants to play with.

This educational puzzle game builds your child's perception, fine motor skills and logical thinking while your child is having a lot of fun!
The difficulty level can be adjusted individually. The app is suitable for toddlers as well as for preschool children! Your child will play the puzzle app for a long time and enjoy it, as there is always a new arrangement of the puzzle pieces.

name: Pair
description: A modern and definitely different gaming experience.

name: 10 More Bullets
description: So, how many ships can you destroy with 10 more bullets ? In this sequel of "10 Bullets", the objective remains the same : wait for the perfect spot and shoot to trigger massive chain reaction. And this time, upgrading your hero and collecting in game boosters will make it a total destruction.

name: Home Sweet Home 2: Kitchens
description:
Sequel to the smash hit Home Sweet Home! Now you'll be designing Kitchens that will take your client's breath away!
Home Sweet Home 2: Kitchens will give you the chance to unleash your hidden talents as an Interior Designer. You choose the furniture, patterns, and colors to create a masterpiece that will blow your client away.
With simple controls, a fun graphical style, and an easy to use interface, Home Sweet Home 2 allows you to nurture your creative side. Remember, a house is not a home until it is a Home Sweet Home!

name: HolidayVille
description:
Lets play to build your own village with lots of fantasy houses, shops, decorations, christmas trees, snowman and wonders.
Welcome to HolidayVille where you can create your dream village based on your imagination using vast number of resources. You can build houses for your citizens, decorations, community buildings and shops so that you can earn money serving your citizens. Grow crops from your crop fields and supply on business to earn money. Make a wonderful place to live for your citizens using a vast number of buildings & architectures.

name: ShortCircuit
description: The classic Mac game now on iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad. ShortCircuit is an action puzzle game where you must remove tiles by connecting two matching tiles with no more than three lines.

name: Infinity Loop: Blueprints
description:
Infinity Loop game is extremely simple, easy to learn puzzle game. Dive into relaxing world of immersive challenges!
Infinity Loops Blueprint is relaxing puzzle game in which you rotate pieces to render them into loop.
Discover infinite mysterious combinations and achieve perfect harmony. Craft your own zen garden mixing infinite loop symbols and blueprint style simplicity and fashion.

name: Balance Board
description:
Hello. How's your balance...
Touch either side of screen to rotate the platform board, keep the ball from falling off. Double Tap and hold for faster rotations.
Hit the star coins with the ball to score points, get highest points then pat yourself on the back.. Congrats champ !

name: Minecraft: Star Wars Mash-up Pack
description: Explore the galaxy in this epic STAR WARS Mash-up, featuring characters and locations from the original trilogy and The Mandalorian series. This is the way!

name: Minecraft: Pac-Man
description: The legendary arcade classic PAC-MAN comes to Minecraft! WAKA-WAKA your way through a-mazeing 3D maze madness! Compete with friends for high scores on 10 challenging stages or build your own in the maze editor. Score big points to unlock new power-ups, like the Laser or TNT. Just make sure to watch out for Inky, Pinky, Blinky, Clyde and... CREEPY?!

name: Knit-Wit
description: Knit-Wit is a push block puzzle game in the style of Nintendo's Game Boy Color. Puzzle your way through fifteen levels as you find enough wool to knit each of your family members a warm jumper and stave off the winter chills.

name: Metallic Men
description: Explore the cosmos as a metallic man who wants to find lots of cool looking crystals.

name: Minecraft: How To Train Your Dragon
description: This is Berk, home of Vikings and dragons! Join Toothless, Hiccup, and the rest of the dragons and riders on heroic adventures in Minecraft. Compete in racing, map the world, and release captive dragons from invading trappers! Tame, collect, and train dragons from the vast reaches of the Barbaric Archipelago to become an expert dragon rider. Includes 24 popular skins!

name: FlatSoccer: Online Soccer
description:
FlatSoccer is an online multiplayer football game with several game modes, the main one being 3v3.

It has a large number of systems that allow the game to be competitive and the players to evolve.

name: Minecraft: Ben 10
description: Become the hero you were always destined to be! Transform into all 10 of Ben’s alien heroes, including Four Arms, Heatblast, and XLR8 in a BEN 10 Minecraft adventure. Defeat Ben’s toughest villains and save the day with your very own Omnitrix! It's Hero Time! Includes Story and Free Roam modes, plus 6 skins!

name: Cities: Skylines II - Day 1 Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Cities: Skylines II - Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Under the Waves: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Starfield: Premium Edition
description:
Starfield is the first new universe in over 25 years from Bethesda Game Studios, the award-winning creators of The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim and Fallout 4. In this next generation role-playing game set amongst the stars, create any character you want and explore with unparalleled freedom as you embark on an epic journey to answer humanity’s greatest mystery.

Premium Edition includes:
- Starfield Base Game
- Shattered Space Story Expansion (upon release)
- Up to 5 days early access*
- Constellation Skin Pack: Equinox Laser Rifle, Spacesuit, Helmet and Boost Pack
- Access to Starfield Digital Artbook & Original Soundtrack

name: Starfield: Constellation Edition
description: In this next generation role-playing game set amongst the stars, create any character you want and explore with unparalleled freedom as you embark on an epic journey to answer humanity’s greatest mystery.

name: The Elder Scrolls Online Collection: Necrom - Deluxe Edition
description:
Traverse the Telvanni Peninsula in Morrowind and preserve secrets ascribed to the unfathomable realms of Apocrypha. Unlock the runic power of a brand-new class - the Arcanist - and fight to uphold reality itself.

The Deluxe Collection: Necrom contains the base game, Necrom, all previous Chapters plus Deluxe in-game items. Pre-purchase to get the Spore mount instantly and more items at launch.

name: Knights of Braveland: Fantastic Beasts
description: The Fantastic Beasts Expansion augments Knights of Braveland with a number of fearsome new bosses. In addition, you will now be able to play as a new hero, the mighty Wizard, who can defeat fantastic beasts with hunter's gear.

name: Marvel's Spider-Man 2: Launch Edition
description: Marvel's Spider-Man 2 is the next game in the critically acclaimed Marvel's Spider-Man franchise. Developed by Insomniac Games in collaboration with PlayStation and Marvel Games.

name: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - Limited Edition
description:
Enhance your game experience with the Limited Edition and get access to the Sarentu Hunter Equipment Pack including one unique weapon and one character gear set only at Amazon.
Explore a world of wonder and danger. Experience the epic wonders of the Western Frontier, a never-before-seen continent of Pandora. Journey through beautiful yet unpredictable open world regions, where lowering your guard can lead to deadly mistakes.
Become Na’vi. Harness your incredible strength and agility while customizing your character; crafting new gear and upgrading skills and weapons to fit your playstyle.
Soar the skies. Bond with your own personal banshee that will give you an edge in aerial combat and can be used for traveling across the vast Western Frontier.
Master multiple combat styles. Fight off the dangers of Pandora as you embrace the precision of traditional Na’vi weapons, including your bow and spear-thrower, or leverage your human training with more destructive weapons, such as an assault rifle or a shotgun.

name: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - Gold Edition
description: With the Gold Edition, get the game and Season Pass including two Story Packs, a bonus quest, a unique banshee, and more! Discover what it means to be Na'vi as you join other clans to protect Pandora from the formidable forces of the RDA.

name: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Cry Babies: Magic Tears - The Big Game
description: Your favourite Cry Babies characters are ready to play! The Big Game is a friendly and fun adventure perfect for young players. Join Lady, Coney, Dreamy and friends in an all-new adventure as they take part in an exciting multi-stage tournament to win the fabled Golden Pacifier!

name: The Pear Game
description: This game is game might not be as it appears! hahahahaha!

name: Stonefly: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Diablo IV: Crypt Hunter Pack
description: Start your hellish journey through Sanctuary with the Crypt Hunter pack. The Crypt Hunter pack includes the Liath Icehowl mount, two weapon skin cosmetics Beginning's End dagger, Protean Axe, and 800 Platinum.

name: Creature in the Well: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Hata Kokoro Danmarku-ren
description: Sin descripción

name: Open Flower
description: A visual novel about a small Japanese family. Just moved to a big city full of surprises and adult adventures.

name: Don't Let Him In
description: A Phycological Third Person Cinematic Experience - Some roads are better left untraveled.

name: Goosebumps Ghouls Slime Slinger
description: A gallery shooter game featured on the Scholastic website.

name: Tarisland
description: Tarisland is a non-P2W MMORPG on PC and mobile that features raids, diverse classes and builds, and a vast world for exploration. Here, myths are real, ghosts exist, and magic is unquestioned. In this immense, open-world playground, choose from various races, each with unique skills and abilities, and embark on an epic adventure full of mystery and dangers to overcome.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Part 1 - The Moon's Origin and Finality
description:
The Moon's Origin and Finality is part 1 of HoYoverse's Honkai Impact 3rd. It tells the stories of Kiana Kaslana, Raiden Mei, Bronya Zaychik, students at St. Freya High and normal Schicksal Valkyries, who through numerous trials, and with the help of their loved ones, protected the world from both the threat of the Honkai and those who sought to purge it no matter the cost.

The Moon's Origin and Finality spans 35 Main Story Chapters along with several bonus EX Chapters and the Elysian Realm Gamemode.

name: Manic Miner
description: Manic Miner is a remake in DOS of a video game originally written for the ZX Spectrum by Matthew Smith and released by Bug-Byte in 1983 (later re-released by Software Projects). It is the first game in the Miner Willy series and among the early titles in the platform game genre. The game itself was inspired by the Atari 800 game Miner 2049er. It has since been ported to numerous home computers and video game consoles.

name: Brave Little Beasties
description: Raise your elemental beasties to become the strongest fighter in the arena. Collect them in wild areas and train them to fight in battles against other players. Crossbreed them to change their element. Sell beasties that you no longer need to other players and try to complete your beastie collection.

name: Truck Driver: The American Dream
description:
Truck Driver: The American Dream is a truck-driving simulation game that is setting out to mix storytelling.

Start from the bottom and work your way to the top in the name of getting your life together and chasing the American Dream.

name: Night Escape
description: Night Escape is a tense and strategic multiplayer game. Uncover the hidden assassin, solve puzzles, and escape the mysterious mansion before it's too late. Survive the night or become a victim. Embark on this deadly race for survival.

name: World of Grimm
description: A fast-paced 5-minute digital collectible card game in the Brothers Grimm universe.

name: Adivinhe o Jogo
description: A quiz where have to guess the game name using the available reviews of the game, hints and soundtrack. Use the twitch integration so your chat can help you.

name: Minecraft: Marvel Spider-Man Skin Pack
description: The pack contained characters from Spider-Man

name: Welcome to Freddy's
description: You, as the nightguard, must prevent someone from attempting to rob the building and prevent the animatronics from damaging valuable equipment in the night hours. For that, you have two specially designed doors at your sides. Prevent them from getting to your office by closing them, but watch out; don't run out of power, or Freddy and his merry band will get you.

name: Oops
description: Sin descripción

name: Lego Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga Starkiller Update
description: For the uninitiated, Luke Starkiller is an early version of Luke Skywalker, as portrayed in concept artwork by Ralph McQuarrie, the designer and illustrator who helped to define the iconic look and style at the Star Wars universe.

name: Heaven Travel
description: An idle game that provides a relaxing and thought-provoking playing experience.

name: The Screetch
description: The Screeth is a mixture of Bejeweled and the three-in-a-row genre.

name: ElectroMaster
description: A game where you control an anime girl who is charged with electricity when you hold the screen and then kills enemies by releasing it.

name: HungryMaster
description:
Sequel to ElectroMaster.

Scrub enemies to lock on! and change them to food! when food is collected enough, bring it to the house. then the mission complete!

When you danger, Two fingers' tap to use the special magic! But it requires 20 food! Over 100 missions in the story mode! also exists time attack mode!

Supporting the game center! Unlock achievements to get the secret items!

name: Imp or Oaf?
description:
Do you think you know the difference between an Imp and an Oaf?

In this game you're given a glimpse into the odd world of these bizarre creatures and you must take a guess at what you think you're looking at: Is it an IMP or an OAF?!

You can tap the picture to zoom out and see more, this will help you make a better guess but you'll get fewer points!

name: Minecraft: Minions
description: Do YOU have what it takes to become a super-villain? You just might! Grab your Minions Adventure Map, and live out your evil dreams as you take on the Vicious 6 in an exciting Adventure Mode. Explore familiar places and cause maximum mischief with Illumination’s Gru and the Minions in Minecraft. Includes 29 franchise skins!

name: Minecraft: Walt Disney World Magic Kingdom Adventure
description: An authentic recreation of Walt Disney World Magic Kingdom! Experience beloved attractions, meet iconic Disney and Pixar characters, and celebrate the 50th anniversary of Walt Disney World with a spectacular fireworks show. With 25 skins included and special in-game merchandise, you can celebrate in style!

name: Minecraft: Ice Age
description: Ice Age freezes the overworld in this mammoth mash-up! Discover the lost world of dinosaurs and acorns a-plenty with the help of Baby Scrat. “It's time to get Buck Wild!”

name: Minecraft: Lightyear
description: Step into Buzz Lightyear’s shoes and journey to the far reaches of space in an action-filled adventure to save your friends and crew from Zurg’s evil plans. With the help of your trusty Star Command gadgets and Space Ranger vehicles, face the dangers on the alien planet, T’Kani Prime, and steer your spaceship to victory!

name: Pixel's Time Paradox
description:
When Pixel learns that author T. T. Hunter has killed himself, he’s devastated. Now he might never know how his favourite book series ends! So, he does what any inventor cat would do: he builds a time machine, to travel back to the novelist’s final hours, in hopes of preventing the tragic act.

But things are never that easy. In this latest addition to the Inspector Waffles universe—created in two weeks for Adventure Jam 2023—help Pixel, along with his flamingo pal JayJay, to solve time travel puzzles, avoid paradoxes, and save the day for literature fans everywhere!

name: Minecraft: SpongeBob SquarePants
description: Are you ready, kids? It’s time to join your favourite under-the-sea chums on an adventure in Minecraft! Visit Bikini Bottom and help make today the BEST DAY EVER for SpongeBob, Patrick, Sandy, and friends. Complete with 40 skins.

name: Minecraft: Batman
description:
Gotham City is in trouble but have no fear – Batman is here!
Fly through the night as the Caped Crusader and save the city from Harley Quinn, The Joker, The Penguin, and more dastardly Super-Villains from the DC universe. Explore the legendary Batcave, utilize the Bat-Gadgets in your Utility Belt, and complete puzzles to repair the sabotaged Nether Portal and save Alfred!

name: Hero of Magic
description: Fantasy arcade tower defense game with RPG elements for iOS.

name: Minecraft: Avatar Legends
description: You are the Avatar, the embodiment of light and peace, now in Minecraft! Master all four elements and learn new skills from Team Avatar and Team Korra. Meet up with Katara, Zuko, and others while completing quests, explore all four nations from the hit shows, and channel your inner bender with the skins of your favorite characters.

name: Plague of the Moon
description:
Many centuries ago, Margaret was introduced to the Black Death. She sought the devil's protection in a pagan cult of devil worshipers. Through demonic rites, Margaret became a powerful sorceress, her strength growing with each year. Then the Bloody Judge set off a vicious wave of executions for profit and pleasure. Margaret was condemned to burn. From within the flames, she cast a dreadful curse upon the land. Then she appeared to her daughter, Alucarda.

"Avenge me, Alucarda! Avenge my death!"

You are Alucarda. You begin the game on a quest for vengeance, though this may change as you progress. You begin with no witchcraft abilities, so you must gain them. The game mainly plays like a classic point-and-click adventure game and features a Sierra-style score system. The player needs to examine the environment, collect objects and solve puzzles. There are also first-person combat sections.

While the game states that it is shareware and advertises a commercial version that's uncensored and features additional content, no such version has ever been found, leaving most to assume it was never completed.

name: War Gun: Shooting Games Online
description: Join Armed Conflict - an epic war game! This is the place where your skill and tactical skills will determine the outcome of the battle. Fight with players from all over the world, diversify your arsenal with weapons and prove your superiority on the battlefield. Are you ready for Armed Conflict?

name: Need for Speed: Unbound - Robojets Swag Pack
description: Switch lanes with the premium pack containing a one-off Legendary Custom and an incredible range of uniquely designed items.

name: Need for Speed: Unbound - Ford Mustang GT Legendary Custom Pack
description: Elevate your style with the Legendary Custom Ford Mustang GT (2015), and get a 10-level Speed Pass boost to unlock new cosmetic or customization items. Use it wisely, as the boost kicks in as soon as the pack is purchased.

name: Nascar Heat 5: Next Gen Car Update
description: The 2022 Season Expansion DLC brings the excitement of the historic 2022 NASCAR Cup Series season to NASCAR Heat 5. The 2022 content will feature all three Next Gen vehicles, as well as the primary schemes for the entire team and driver roster from the season.

name: The Callisto Protocol: Final Transmission
description: Dig deeper into the horrifying secrets of The Callisto Protocol.

name: JungleRing2D
description: Jungle Ring is a fun and exciting game,that improves and trainning your reaction.The game is based on your concentration and reaction.How good is your reaction,you can test in this game?Would be you able to pass all levels?

name: Impossible Stunts
description: Prepare for an adrenaline-pumping experience in this racing game of Impossible Stunts!

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021: Dodge, Plymouth, Chrysler Remastered
description: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021 - Dodge | Plymouth | Chrysler Remastered includes 8 licensed cars from 3 manufacturers!

name: Europa Universalis IV: China History Lessons
description: Learn more about Ming China, the early Qing dynasty and the surrounding nations in this package of lectures from Laszlo Montgomery, host of the popular History of China podcast.

name: Europa Universalis IV: Japan History Lessons
description: Learn more about the history of early modern Japan in this package of lectures from Isaac Meyer, host of the popular History of Japan podcast.

name: Gun to the Zone
description: Find powerful weapons, fight monsters and discover the secrets of the Zone. Each weapon is different.

name: Mysterious Place
description: Design: In this game, players will step into the world of a Mysterious Place. Navigate the enigmatic landscapes and make crucial decisions. With pixel graphics and high-quality animations, immerse yourself in a visually stunning and atmospheric experience. Available in Russian and English.

name: The Last Hero of Nostalgaia: Deluxe Edition
description: Experience the full intriguing world of Nostalgaia with the Deluxe Edition which includes the base game and the newest adventure, The Rise of Evil DLC.

name: Surviving Mars: Starter Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Paper Plane
description: "Paper Plane" is a retro style 2D shooting game with high difficulty. Graphics drawn mostly by Office Excel and sound FX made by the author's mouth.

name: Galaga
description: Atari 7800 port of Galaga.

name: Sweetcore Brews
description: Sweetcore Brews is an otome about a tea-brewing witch called “Milly”, whose dream is to open her own magical tea shop in the city. She is currently an apprentice witch working at an existing magical tea shop where the shopkeeper is rarely around. So Milly manages the shop full-time, practicing daily her new magical teas on her own by using them as solutions for her customers’ lives. She meets two love interests – Zero and Kingsley, both are also magical humans who run their own unique businesses. This game is a slice of life romance where Milly deals with the funny mistakes she makes from her magical teas causing problems, and she falls in love with Zero or Kingsley over time.

name: Yakuza Complete Series
description: Sin descripción

name: The Yakuza Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Europa Universalis IV: History Lessons Bundle
description: Learn while you play in this package of history lectures specially designed for Europa Universalis IV. Knowledgeable authorities on the history and culture of the early modern era present short lectures on specific topics, organized by region.

name: Hide and Seek 2: Story of Demian
description: Main character, Gwyn Demian, heard news that there is treasure in a residence that shut down a few years back. But there was the shadow of death. The more he tried to live, the more drastic things became for him. Which choice does he choose?

name: Dawn of Man + Planetbase
description:
Planetbase:
Guide a group of space settlers trying to establish a base on a remote planet.

Dawn of Man:
Command a settlement of ancient humans, guide them through the ages in their struggle for survival.

name: Southernmost Combine
description: Southernmost Combine is an alternate epilogue to Half Life 2 Episode 2, in which Gordon Freeman is sent back in time to the 1980´s to stop a Combine recon deployment happening in the southernmost land of the world. There are a few deviations in gameplay mechanics (more tactical and slow paced, no gravity gun, inventory) but it´s still Gordon fighting the combine and rebels helping him to achieve it. This is a small episode consisting of a variated set of scenaries with unique art made ex-profeso to bring Source to the look of the southamerican region in the 1980´s.

name: Duke Nukem 3D: Fallout Freeze
description:
Duke Nukem 3D: Fallout Freeze — is a mod that includes one level for Duke Nukem 3D Atomic Edition with custom art and code. It’s a Christmas themed mod whose main task is to bring a holiday atmosphere, but keep the vanilla style.

The level takes place in a captured by the aliens shopping mall “Queen's Mall”. Although the first part of the map is linear, the second part is designed for fully free exploration.

name: Territory War Online
description:
Defend your turf! They think they can take over your land? They have another thing coming...

A throwback to classic games such as Worms and Scorched Earth, this turn-based battle game is off the chain; unleash ballistic destruction upon the invaders and shed no tears as they burst into dust.

Test your skills online in this multiplayer edition -- Can you be the top dog? Jump online with your XGen account, or hit quickstart for instant action.

name: Doeo
description: You’ll need a sharp eye and fast fingers to master Doeo! This online action game gets you grabbing as many Doeos as you can before the clock runs down. Mouse over to catch them as quickly as possible before they disappear. Catch your quota to advance to the next hilarious level. Make it to the sixth and final level to take on the boss. I bet you’ll laugh… at least once!

name: Target Party
description:
Welcome to Target Party, the first-person platform game that will make you feel the adrenaline of speed and the art of speedrunning! Face a fast-paced challenge as you dash through action-packed, thrilling levels with only one goal in mind: destroy all the targets before you reach the finish line, and do it at full speed!
Explore different strategies and routes, perfect your jumps and spins, and discover hidden shortcuts as you dive into the challenging world of Target Party. Master the mechanics and compete with players from around the world in online leaderboards to prove who is the true king of the party.
Join the party and discover why Target Party is the first-person platformer that will keep you glued to the screen, enjoying dizzying thrills with every jump, every shot and every second it takes to reach victory!

name: Final Fantasy Tactics: The Lion War of the Lions
description: Developed by passionate Final Fantasy Tactics fans, Final Fantasy Tactics: The Lion War of the Lions is a tactical role-playing game that serves as an enhanced, 'definitive' port of the original Final Fantasy Tactics, incorporating content from its official remakes. It is an enhanced follow-up to their original hack, Final Fantasy Tactics: The Lion War.

name: Birds & Bombs
description: Wicked ghosts have kidnapped the president’s daughter, trapping her in a haunted mansion! As a plucky young bird trooper you must use your bomb-throwing abilities to defeat the ghosts and rescue the girl. Ghosts can only be destroyed by throwing bombs into their mouths. Use the stylus to set your throwing angle and take your best shot! Bounce bombs off walls and eerie floating furniture to defeat all the spooks in each stage, but make sure not to run out of bombs or you're in for a fright! In addition to the main Story Mode, you can really put your skills to the test in Challenge Mode with only a limited number of bombs to last you through to the end. But never fear; with perseverance and accuracy, you're sure to replenish your supply and stay in high spirits!

name: Winnose
description: Pull yourself together and go looking for your missing other half in the puzzler winnose by Todd Luke and Calum Bowen.

name: BathDoom
description:
A Doom II mod of a fashionable bathroom. GZDoom recommended to play.

It is 2149. You are in the middle of killing demons when you remember your house on Deimos still needs its bathroom remodeled. The task is perilous, as one wrong move will send the upper floor into the depths of Hell. Be prepared...for BATHDOOM.

name: Blood River Base
description: Welcome to the scenic mountain area known as Blood River Base! This WAD was made in under 64KB and will work in vanilla DOOM II. Traverse large canyons and destroy Hell's legions as the dangerous Blood River flows beneath.

name: Doom Hockey
description:
Doom Hockey is a GZDoom multiplayer mod that brings exciting ice rink action into Doom! Up to four players can play on the Red or Blue teams, all while various items appear on the rink to shoot at the puck (or the other team). Each match can be customized in game. Play with a 5 minute timer and see which team
gets more goals, or turn the timer off and play a Best of 5.

name: My Crimes
description: Get rid of the crimes. Grab all the evidence. Probably get arrested anyway because you have dogshit lawyers. Don't stop punching the boxes, it's your only way out.

name: Fun.Io
description: Battle for survival in FUN.IO! Choose your tank, face deadly bots, and reach the top of the leaderboard in a relentless arena. Customize your tank, unlock upgrades, and prove your skills in this roquelike action experience. Are you ready for the challenge?

name: Amalgamy
description: Blend into the crowd, track down your friends and win the game.

name: Tero: Terror Hour
description: Your mother didn't let you watch TV at night... and even after her death, she still won't let you... Don't let her catch you watching that damn horror movie you just bought... Cover yourself with the blanket!

name: TankHero
description: Tank Hero is a third-person 3D game. This game requires players to operate a tank to eliminate enemies along the way and advance to the end in a complex road environment. Facing different environments, choose the right tank to start the challenge!

name: Zombie Smash Racer
description: In Zombie Smash Racer you control a tank on the insane speed, blowing up everything on your way and smashing zombies coming to you. This game puts you two tasks: to kill as many zombies as you can and survive as long as possible without crashing. When you collides with counter obstacles you'll lose health, so you need to go around or destroy them to survive. Using GameCenter leaderboards, you can compete with your friends!

name: Doodle Truck
description: You are a busy truck driver. every day, it's up to you to deliver important payloads to their various destinations.

name: My Pocket Arcade
description: A nostalgic ticket-redemption arcade featuring all of your favorite games. Win tickets and use them to buy awesome virtual prizes at the Prize Wall.

name: Love or Passion
description: This interactive story love game will have you hooked up on reading! Great news for story lovers! The best romance story love game is finally out. Don’t miss your chance to download it and enjoy reading captivating chapters of Love or Passion - Love Game Romance Teen Story Game.

name: Pinata Punishers: Idle Clicker
description: Celebrate the Piñata Carnival with all the townsfolk in this fun and wacky idle clicker game where you bash as many piñatas as you can, collect hoards of candy and punish evil piñatas before they destroy the carnival!

name: Samosa: Runner Gunner
description:
Sam is an auto driver who lives happily with his pet chicken.
Osa is an evil scientist who wants to conquer the whole world for his own experiments.
When they both come face to face, it is going to be one epic showdown.
Play as Sam the auto driver and shoot at waves of Osa's minions. Its a fast paced auto runner shooter where you come against plenty of various enemies. The Auto you ride comes with some handy spells which when used correctly can be the difference between dying at the hands of the robots or burning them to the ground. When you think those minions are easy , the bosses wont let you through without a big fight.

name: Sevyal
description: Sevyal is a single-player horror game set in an underground hospital. Something has gone wrong and as a government official, you must visit the location, repair the electricity, survive, establish communication with the military, and escape.

name: Age of Water
description:
Age of Water is a new MMO game set in a post-apocalyptic Earth completely covered in water.

The rooftops of high-rise buildings and tops of other man-made and natural objects turned into islands, on which the surviving people built new settlements. Your adventure begins near one of them.

name: Garden Dreams
description: Click around the garden to perform various jobs, like watering plants, picking produce and unleashing pesticides.

name: She Wants to Suck My Blood?
description: Step into the shoes of a daring hero and embark on a thrilling adventure set in 19th-century Europe. Your mission is to defeat the tyrannical vampire queen, Camila, but when you're unexpectedly caught and forced to serve her, everything changes. With the help of Nadia, Camila's loyal butler, and Trinity, her vampire-in-training maid, you'll uncover secrets that will alter the course of your journey. Brace yourself as danger lurks around every corner, and you realize that the lines between good and evil are not always clear-cut.

name: Cut It: Brain Puzzles
description: Simple puzzle game where you cut shapes in order to collect stars.

name: Samurai Slash
description: Samurai Slash is runner in Japanese style! Run, collect the power and gold, slash your enemies with two katanas, and finally fight with big boss.

name: Super Mario RPG
description:
Mario, Bowser, and Peach partner up to repair the wish-granting Star Road in this approachable role-playing adventure.

Team up with an oddball group of heroes to save Star Road and stop the troublemaking Smithy Gang. This colorful RPG has updated graphics and cinematics that add even more charm to the unexpected alliance between Mario, Bowser, Peach, and original characters Mallow and Geno.

Enter (or revisit) this world of eccentric allies and offbeat enemies in an RPG for everyone.

name: Luigi's Mansion 2 HD
description:
A remaster of the 3DS game for Nintendo Switch.

Luigi's Mansion: Dark Moon gives players multiple mansions to explore, a variety of puzzles to solve and new ghosts to capture. Armed with the Poltergust 5000, a ghost-sucking, vacuum-like invention, Luigi must complete a number of missions assigned to him by Professor E. Gadd.

Shining a light on the ghosts is no longer enough to stun them into immobility. Players need to activate a new strobe function to stun the ghosts before sucking them up with the Poltergust 5000.

Every mansion is filled with unique puzzle elements and ghosts. Players must figure out how to defeat each one of them and find hidden clues and keys to unlock new areas.

name: Batman: Arkham Trilogy
description:
A bundle including the three main entries of the Batman: Arkham series: Batman: Arkham Asylum, Batman: Arkham City, and Batman: Arkham Knight.

It includes all previously released DLCs.

name: Silent Hope
description: Explore, fight, and produce items to grow stronger as seven distinct heroes in this silent world. Guided by the Princess, you'll delve into the Abyss and learn the mysteries of the King and his now-ruined kingdom. In a world without words, what hope is there for humanity?

name: Manic Mechanics
description:
It’s time to dust off your overalls and hitch on your toolbelt in Manic Mechanics - a chaotic couch co-op game where you and up to three fellow grease monkeys serve the car-obsessed residents of Octane Isle.

Your mission? Work your way through Octane Isle's five neighborhoods, challenging the Master Mechanics that rule each part of town. Repair as many cars, trucks, choppers, tractors, mini-subs (and even UFOs) as possible to prove your worth in this hectic race against the clock.

name: Dragon Quest Monsters: The Dark Prince
description:
Journey into a fantastical world on a quest for revenge in DRAGON QUEST MONSTERS: The Dark Prince.

Psaro is cursed and is unable to harm anything with monster blood. Now, he must become a Monster Wrangler to create an army for battle.

The hunt for high-ranked monsters takes Psaro through the ever-changing seasons of Nadiria and its unique environments, with rivers of bubbling lava, mysterious ancient ruins, and soaring towers of cake. Along the way, Psaro meets the kind-hearted elf, Rose, who joins his adventure to seek out ever-stronger monsters.

The key to Psaro's success lies with synthesis: the ability to combine two monsters and create a stronger offspring. Each new creation brings Psaro one step closer to his goal of becoming the Master of Monsterkind.

name: Lamecraft
description: Lamecraft, developed by Drakon, is a game revolved around building with cube blocks of all types. You can build huge castles, or you can build tiny huts, either way the world can all be edited all you want. Everyday Drakon's working hard to provide you all of the fun and joy you wish to and have and more!

name: Pikmin 1
description:
Find your way home in the original Pikmin-plucking adventure

Meet Captain Olimar and a capable cast of red, blue, and yellow Pikmin on a dire mission across a larger-than-life planet. Olimar must guide his loveably-leafy companions through obstacles, in battle, and when collecting his missing ship parts. Your oxygen will only last 30 days, but the Pikmin provide a glimmer of hope that you may make it home.

name: Pikmin 2
description:
Meet even more Pikmin (and Louie) on a treasure-hunting expedition

Swap between Olimar and Louie to divide and conquer in Pikmin 2. Tasked with helping pay off their employer’s debt, the pint-sized pair teams up with Pikmin (including purple and white Pikmin) to collect treasure on...you guessed it...a strange planet. Time ticks away on the surface, but cave systems let you take your time to let your strategy blossom.

name: Penny's Big Breakaway
description: Join Penny & Yo-Yo in a kinetic 3D-platformer bursting with innovative gameplay! Showcase your catalog of tricks and chain impressive combos to deliver Penny & Yo-Yo's perfect breakout performance. Take the stage with this vibrant pair in Penny’s Big Breakaway.

name: Star Ocean: The Second Story R
description:
Two worlds, one fateful encounter.

In an endless sea of stars, at the edge of the universe, two people who live in different worlds go on a journey to save planet Expel.

Choose your path and witness an awakened destiny.

name: Super Mario Bros. Wonder
description:
The next evolution of 2D side-scrolling Super Mario Bros. games is headed to Nintendo Switch!

When you touch a Wonder Flower in the game, the wonders of the world unlock – pipes could come alive, hordes of enemies may appear, characters might change their looks, for example – transforming the gameplay in unpredictable ways. Excitement and different surprises await in each course. Super Mario Bros. Wonder features Princess Peach, Princess Daisy and Yoshi as playable characters, in addition to familiar characters like Mario, Luigi and Toad.

name: Princess Peach: Showtime!
description:
The wicked Grape and the Sour Bunch have taken over the Sparkle Theater, and now it's up to Peach and the theater's guardian Stella to save the play––and the day!

Peach can transform and use fantastic showstopping abilities to face off against the Sour Bunch.

Fend off the Sour Bunch with sensational swordplay as a swordfighter...en garde! In another role, Peach puts on her detective hat to find out whodunnit in a museum mystery. From kung fu master to pastry chef, Peach’s roles give you distinctly powerful ways to save the play!

name: WarioWare: Move It!
description:
Strike a pose with a multitude of motion-based microgames in a brand-new entry in the WarioWare series!
Grab a pair of Joy-Con controllers and get moving as you gently shake, punch, dance, wiggle, and even curtsey through over 200 lightning-fast microgames (minigames that last just a few hilarious seconds). A second player can use another set of Joy-Con controllers to join the treasure-guarding, sheep-twirling fun. Up to 4 players, each with one Joy-Con controller, can laugh out loud in the local Party Mode’s minigames like a dicey board game with Wario-style rules.

name: Pikmin 1+2 Bundle
description:
Revisit the first two Pikmin games on the Nintendo Switch system!

Reintroduce yourself to the plantlike Pikmin and strategic gameplay that this charming series is rooted in. From finding a way home to collecting treasure, Olimar (plus Louie in the Pikmin 2 game) must partner with a parade of Pikmin to survive the harshest of conditions. Both games support optional motion controls for more options when guiding your floral friends.

Find your way home in the original Pikmin-plucking adventure

name: Burn the City
description:
Burn The City is a physics-based action puzzler.

You think you'd like to "BURN THE CITY"? Well you're in luck! Wanton destruction is easier than ever. Just touch, drag and release. You'll soon be launching endless fiery monster action all up in that "CITY".

It's that easy.

name: Burn the Corn
description:
Be aware! Evil Moisture will send many Water Babies to stand in your way! These minions from the Realm of Moisture have the power to nature your Magic Flame! You should demonstrate your skill by moving around it gracefully while turning the baby corns into delicious popcorn!

There are times when the anxious baby corns burst out all at once! This is the moment where you can use some help from your powerful allies! The Fire Warrior can combine with your Magic Flame to strengthen your power while the Time Wizard can slow down time to give you some breathing room. You will discover many more exciting elements and learn how to use them to your advantage throughout this magical journey!

Now! Let us work together to help the baby corns to make their dreams come true!!

name: Hot Wheels: Rift Rally
description: An AR racing game featuring hot wheels cars

name: The Great War of Prefectures
description: Invade and Build to conquer Japan! Time for peace is over. Unleash death to become the Emperor of Japan! Turn based strategy game inspired by risk and Nobunaga’s Ambition.

name: Fear Assessment
description: The Fear Assessment program is a specialized test developed and implemented by government agencies to collect data on psychological torture techniques and their impact on individuals. It serves as an essential tool in understanding the effects of fear-based manipulation. This test uses your webcam.

name: Call of Mini: Sniper
description:
Call of Mini-Sniper is a first-person action game where you play as an expert sniper who's trying to survive the zombie apocalypse and save as many civilians as possible along the way. Thankfully, you have your faithful sniper rifle by your side.

In Call of Mini-Sniper, you don't have to move your character; all you have to do is focus on your aim. By tapping the screen, you can use the sniper's viewfinder for more precise shots. To pull the trigger, just tap the button on the bottom right corner of the screen.

name: Pyro
description: A physics-based puzzle game where the goal is to light torches by slinging fireballs.

name: Umamusume: Pretty Derby - Party Dash
description: Give heed! Our academy's time-honored Spring Fan Fest will play to a very special event! Behold, the Slapdash Grand Prix! Teams will compete in four exhilarating events! Aim for ultimate glory in Hurtling Hurdles, Blazing Baskets, Dodgeball Demolitions, and Gourmet Gauntlet!

name: Overkill
description: Sin descripción

name: Rockman 6: After Tournament
description:
Sequel of Rockman6 Shadow Game? Recommend to use special weapons. About special weapons, see read [Weapons].

You have Rush adaptors and Beat from game’s start.

If you lose the game, you can go back 8 robot master’s stages even when you start Mr.X’s stage. And the progress of Mr.X and Dr.Wily’s stage is maintained.

name: Icomania
description:
From the creators of #1 app "4 pics 1 word”
Celebs, brands, movies and more – can you guess what the icon depicts?
Find out why the whole world loves icomania and join the fun!

name: Flipper Soccer
description: Play a quick game of Flipper Soccer - the game that mixes football with pinball. Control the flippers to score goals against your opponent, who can be your friend or the computer.

name: DUI
description:
DUI is a world full of blocks. To pass the level, you should remove required amount of blocks and get the left blocks stay inactive(NOT ON GRAY BLOCK).
Furthermore, we strongly recommend that you get your hands wet with the level editor through which you can create your own blocks world and then share the levels you made with your friends.

name: Canadian Higurashi
description: Keiichi Maebara has just moved to the quiet little village of Hinamizawa in the winter of 2006 and quickly becomes inseparable friends with schoolmates Rena Ryuguu, Mion Sonozaki, Satoko Houjou, and Rika Furude. One of Keiichi's classmate start to act strange and ask him all sort of weird question. While trying to help her, he unearth the darkness that lurks over seemingly idyllic life they lead.

name: Cartoon Network: Battle Crashers
description: A cancelled DS port of Cartoon Network: Battle Crashers.

name: Swordbird Song: The Iron Owl Tower
description:
Follow the Bird Hero entering the lair of the Iron Owls in this short Action RPG game for Gameboy.

Bird Hero gets their journey interrupted when hit by a lightning bolt and falls on a remote island.

They learn the island is ruled by the Owl King, an evil ruler who enslaves the islanders, making them work in his tower.

Find your way into the Iron Owl Tower, defeat the Owl King and free the island from his evil!

name: Root Infinity Rexx: Limited Edition
description:
Root Rexx, stylized as ROOT∞REXX, is an otome visual novel video game developed by Otomate, exclusively released for the PlayStation Vita by Idea Factory on January 22, 2015 in Japan. The game follows Mochizuki Kazune, a teenage girl who meets members of the fictional boy band Rexx.

The limited edition comes with a special booklet and exclusive drama CD.

name: Lover Pretend: Limited Edition
description:
Lights, camera, action! A hilarious comedy about the entertainment industry and the colorful characters that populate it.

The limited edition comes with the soundtrack CD and exclusive character cards.

name: As Long As It's Not Illegal: Act II
description: Join the senior class as they split off into groups to see what the city holds.

name: Sex Story: Ruby and Hunter - Episode 3
description: The story continues with Ruby's perspective, as she wakes up in Hunter's bed after their wild night to some expensive gifts. She plans a special thank-you to reward Hunter's gesture, but it takes a hell of a turn when she catches his naughty Maid playing with her pussy while she is spying on her.

name: Zombie Town!
description: A fun quick-play game for all. You play as the game's hero, protecting your local neighbourhood from the zombie invasion.

name: Sex Simulator: Beach Resort
description: An interactive sex simulation game featuring visual novel elements, high definition images and videos, and realistic-looking characters set in a beautiful decor. You play as a guy who takes three different women on vacations to a luxury beach resort.

name: Lost Connections
description: If she leaves now you will never see her again. Would you have enough courage to take a step, or would you stay quiet and regret it? Experience this story about love and loss.

name: Phanotia: Interlude I-Aubzan Abbey
description: Princess Biana of the Fraensius Empire decided to send her trusted courtiers Celine and Allea, as well as Connecticut, as foreign aid to rescue the Vampir prostitutes who were secretly imprisoned in the Aubzan Abbey and played for the nobles, And try to find a larger dark network behind it.

name: Adorabilis
description: "Adorabilis" is a game where you control a white ghost to protect adorabilis from various threats while sending it home. You'll have to dodge enemies and trap, or using skills to get through difficulties on the way to home.

name: Atelier Ryza 3: Additional Area - Ashra-am Baird Outlying Areas
description: Adds an area featuring the outlying regions of Ashra-am Baird! Adds a new exploration area and World Quests based on the outlying regions of the royal capital, Ashra-am Baird featured in Atelier Ryza 2.

name: Mistified
description: Traverse an unknown land, purify the corruption, and salvage the souls of the lost by solving increasingly complex puzzles.

name: Idle Champions: Mythic Ishi Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Ishi (if you don't already own them) Mythic Ishi Skin An Epic Feat for Ishi 7 Gold Ishi Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Danger Drop
description: Defy gravity, conquer challenges, and reach new heights in this thrilling platformer. Do you have what it takes? Can you overcome the trials, avoid deadly falls, and prove your platforming prowess?

name: Coraland: The Worst Rescuer
description: Coraland is a puzzle adventure game where we follow Joris, a good for nothing rescuer on her first adventure to save Pon-Pon island from imminent danger. The controls are simple and the puzzles have been designed to be accessible for all ages, without outside knowledge to solve them.

name: Circuit Superstars DLC: Top Gear - The Stig Challenge
description: Top Gear: The Stig Challenge brings a new kind of experience to Circuit Superstars. Inspired by classic moments of the legendary TV show, this expansion invites you to test your skills on a whole new level and laugh a lot while you're at it!

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard DD: Character Set 07 - Chrono Shindou
description: Set including Fighter "Chrono Shindou" and sleeves.

name: Crazy Brain
description: A fast paced strategic Block Breaking Pinball-type Score Attack style videogame.

name: Dead City: Street Fighter Pack
description: What could be better than a good old street fight!

name: Sweet Feets
description: Sweet Feets is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: New Lands 3: Paradise Island
description: Try being the owner of a whole island amid the south sea in new time management game. Gather tropical fruit and make refreshing ice cream. Develop your own resort. As you go farther into the new lands, your tasks will become ever more varied and difficult. Train your skills in the new time manager genre game!

name: Turtle Rush
description:
Easy! Fun! Turtle Rush!
When turtle is on rush, just break everything.
Easy and Fun! Relieve your Stress with your Turtle.

name: Car Rush I
description:
Car Rush is a simple driving game. Avoid other cars, and survive as long as possible.
Also do not forget to watch the fuel gauge. When make it run out of fuel, the game is over.

name: Emergency HD
description: Command fire brigades, rescue services and police forces in a rescue strategy game with realistic graphics! Fight against fires, save lives and eliminate terrorists - in 14 elaborate missions!

name: Tap To Jump On Time 3D
description:
It is a game in which the ball jumps to avoid colliding with other colored balls.
To jump, just tap the screen before colliding with the ball.
Let's start with who is the best.

name: Lightning Duru
description: Lightning Duru is a classic 2D shooting game. Players will control two airships from “X War Office” to eliminate the enemies encountered in different missions.

name: The Silver Bullet
description:
Kali, the legendary "Goddess of Death" in the South America Revolution.
She joined Neverlight, the counter-demon organization, after some kind of incident.
She wield two pistols that carve silver on bullets became a secret agent who hunts down demons.
Kali was investigating a strange case occurred in the Axis-21 Marine Research Plant
when she discovers the large and shadowy conspiracy of failed Project Prometheus.

name: Spitter Man vs. The Pooping Birds
description: Protect the city from the Poopings Bird !

name: Envasion
description: You love shooting stuff non-stop while your whole screen keeps exploding for days? Then this game’s for you, son! Buy and upgrade an assortment of tanks and weapons to roll them into battle! Those machineguns, plasma cannons, railguns, cannons, bombs and missiles will be worth everything you spend on ’em!

name: Minecraft: Summer of Arcade Skin Pack
description: Minecraft: Summer of Arcade Skin Pack was an exclusive skin DLC pack released during the Summer of Arcade Event on Xbox 360.

name: Fear Assessment+
description:
“Fear Assessment+” is here to give you the fear of you watching “Lost Episode Creepypastas” again, or the feeling of going through cardiac arrest.

I officially announce “Fear Assessment+” an alternate version of the fear assessment, with extended content, including: 3+ levels, an narrator, settings, longer levels, better and unique experience, and the scare-factor goes from 5 all the way to 10.

name: Marauder of Dystopia: The Weakest Go To The Wall
description:
The people of the Omega Empire suffer under the oppressive rule of Emperor Duke—but a beautiful, dark-haired woman, sword in hand, has risen up to assassinate oppressors until the people are free!

Marauder of Dystopia: The Weakest Go To The Wall is a doujin RPG from ONEONE1 featuring animated battles and more.

name: Colorspace
description:
Colorspace is a fast paced singleplayer racing game where you have to destroy obstacles by changing to the right color. Set in a neon minimalist environement, you must clear the levels as fast as possible to restore the communication signal.
The best part is you don't have breaks!

name: Machine Phantasm
description: A medium paced Waves / Arena shooter in VR

name: Light Speed Ride Out
description: Light Speed Ride Out is a top-down space survivors arena shooter with roguelite elements. Upgrade your ship with a variety of items to create unique builds and survive the enemy hordes. Assemble the crew of your ship, make the right decisions and rescue people to get them to join your space colony.

name: Masternoid
description:
Experience the captivating world of an arcade reborn and embrace the meditative power of coordinated voxel explosions.

Master the art of destruction, in a place where your trusted energy blaster is your only friend.

Skillfully juggle and control multiple ultrasonic balls with great finesse and precision.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild - Throwback Expansion
description: A The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild mod which adds Whomp's Fortress from Super Mario 64 in the game.

name: War Mahjong
description: Sin descripción

name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild - The Lost Records
description: A mod for The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild which adds a dungeon based on The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword.

name: Fallen Force
description: Rogue-lite arena shooter, where you kill monsters by knocking them out of arena. Shoot them, punch them, freeze them, burn them and much more in this unique take on a genre.

name: Quantum Derelict
description: Quantum Derelict is a rogue-lite survival horror game set in a chilling Lovecraftian inspired narrative. In the uncharted vastness of space, outwit the sinister cult of VUGSHERYOG and the lurking horrors as you strive to retain your sanity, find rescue, and survive against all odds.

name: Escape! Skeleton.J
description:
Here is a little monster.
He likes collecting special goodies from human village.
However, he did not know what disaster his childish hobby would bring about.
Taking the role of the little monster, player will sneak into the village, avoid the villagers, and collect as many "goodies" as possible!

name: Bubble Melody
description:
Chillax with bubble popping mayhem!
Save the Mega Cute Miximals from their bubble prisons while you enjoy a bubble popping bonaza. Whatever you do don’t pop Boomskull’s bubble or let any of the other bubbles escape!
Can you survive the bubble waves and rack up the highest score?

name: Flappy Eros
description: Flap the little wings of the Eros and try to save St. Valentine's Day! Collect hearts and different equipments like shields and bows to protect yourself during the journey! God of Love awaits you!

name: Castle of Heart + Jet Kave Adventure Bundle
description: Experience two thrilling adventures in this action packed bundle.

name: The Pegasus Expedition: Grand Admiral Edition
description: A convenient bundle for fans of The Pegasus Expedition, combining the game, digital artbook and digital soundtrack in one handy package. Available to complete your set even if you already own some of the contents!

name: Trepang2: Banger Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: American Hero Unrated
description: Sin descripción

name: Ourworld
description: Ourworld is a 1:1 global flight simulator. You'll battle awakened A.I.s, safeguarding our world. It features 3D city modeling, multiplayer online gaming. Deluxe version include all aircraft and features.

name: TS Marketplace: Sps 466 Wagon
description: Enter the world of track construction with the Sps 466 sleeper transport wagon from Join Together for Train Simulator.

name: 3 Hit Blunders Bundle
description:
A collection of 80's retro inspired games (Commodore64 / ZX 48K Spectrum/ Arcade):
- Ah 'ate those flockin birds - A 2d arcade shooter
- Retroa Retroa Builda - A 2d precision platformer
- Slime? Climb? - A 2d puzzle block climber

name: Hotel Renovator: Gym Furniture Set
description: Are you ready to pump up your hotel? Well, you can flex your business biceps in the Gym Furniture Set. Complete your new objective to customize the hotel gym with plenty of options and attract fitfluencers from around the world.

name: Hell of Nightmares: Chapter 1
description: You have to escape Miss Roseville's school by solving puzzles

name: Solemn Knights: Entirely Ours
description: A 2D, turned-based, story driven action RPG.

name: Licačka
description: A game inspired by the flights of the streamer Fluffcz in the flight simulator with the Flamélie aircraft. You will weave through doors and try to achieve the highest score possible, so you can see the monuments, just like Fluffcz does on his flights.

name: Logos Quiz
description: Logos Quiz is an entertaining game where you guess the logos of popular companies. Advance through levels of difficulty and strive for the highest score possible. The more logos you guess the more coins you will earn. If you get stuck and don't know an answer, don't give up! use the coins you gathered to get hints or remove unnecessary letters. If you are still stuck try asking your friends on Twitter or Facebook.

name: Blazing 8s
description: Blazing 8s is an Activity that we've developed here at Discord. It is our Crazy Eights-inspired card game that you can play with your friends! The rules are simple — on your turn, discard a card from your hand with the same suit or number as the previous card. Playing special cards allows you to skip other players, reverse the direction of play, and even swap hands with other players. The first person to discard all their cards wins!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Rust and Fast Pack
description: In the Rust and Fast Pack you will find nothing less than two legends like Mod Rod and the futuristic FusionBusta. Mod Rod combines a classic look with modern details, combining the best of both worlds for a result that is all style and energy, with its signature all-round windows that makes it even more badass. And when modern isn't enough, get behind the wheel of the futuristic FusionBusta and its super-powered engine, that takes the hot rods towards new horizons of evolution!

name: Golf Ba Multimedia Shinchaku: Susono Country Club Hen
description: This game revolves on the popular Susono Country Club at Mount Fuji featuring many photos and multimedia of the actual place. Players utilize in-depth golf physics and rules in three different field locations to hit the ball into the hole within the par limit.

name: Bobble League
description: Bobble League is an Activity developed by Discord. Work with your friends to control your Bobbles on a tabletop setting in an attempt to score on the other team’s goal. With an emphasis on strategy and teamwork, you will experience a range of emotions in Bobble League as you watch your decisions play out in real-time against the opposing team. Use various Power Plays to improve your odds of scoring.

name: Akagi: Touhaiden
description: Based on Nobuyuki Fukumoto's manga "Akagi: Yami ni Oritatta Tensai" and some live-action adaptations, the game explores the gambling exploits of Shigeru Akagi. The player progresses the story by winning Mahjong games in two to four player matches with the stakes gradually rising through each new game, with the goal of become a legendary champion.

name: Midnight Heist
description: Sin descripción

name: Guilty Me
description: In Guilty Me, take the role of Lucy on a scary nighttime journey home from the coffee shop. Face psychological terror, explore a dark environment, and uncover hidden secrets. Survive the chase and immerse yourself in a gripping walk simulator of suspense.

name: Drag the Rope
description: A puzzle game that requires you to drag rope in various directions without retracing your steps.

name: Hyperlight
description: Take control of the Hyperlight in this psychedelic cosmic environment where countless evil beings try to destroy you, the last human fighter. However, your ship posses an incredible power!

name: Checkers in the Park
description: Checkers in the Park is an Activity that we've developed here at Discord for playing checkers with your friends!

name: Chess in the Park
description: Chess in the Park is an Activity that we've developed here at Discord for playing chess with your friends!

name: Hiiro no Kakera Aizouban: Akane Iro no Tsuioku - Limited Edition
description: The PlayStation 3 version makes use of the graphical system in Hakuoki: Junsouroku. The sprites move when they talk. The new edition also includes new scenarios, chapter summaries, and a couple of girls will come out to explain about the wrong decisions players made when they get a bad end.

name: Fingertip Balance
description:
Fingertip Balance is a very demanding mini-game where you must balance weight as long as you can.
The handle will shrink every ten seconds, making it even harder to keep your balance.

A combination of patience, anticipation and fine balancing skills will be needed to make it to the top.

name: Tag & Vee in Mithra Planet
description: Sin descripción

name: Know What I Meme
description: Know What I Meme is a social party game of GIFs, memes, and good times! Select a text setup for the meme, browse to find the perfect GIF response, then everyone votes on which was their favorite. Earn points to prove just how funny you are. Up to 9 players can play but anyone can watch the fun!

name: I'm on Observation Duty 6
description: The most ambitious I'm on Observation Duty game yet with six unique levels. Gameplay is familiar to those who have played the previous games. The game is part of a series of popular "spot the difference" -type of horror games. In I'm on Observation Duty 6 the players job is to monitor live surveillance camera footage and spot anomalies in the monitored rooms. You can swap between different camera-views. An anomaly means that for example something (e.g. a piece of furniture) has moved, an extra object has appeared or something has disappeared. There's also scary intruders. When you notice something is different in any of the monitored rooms you have to file a report by clicking on the anomaly or choosing the right location and type of the anomaly from a menu to fix it. Anoamalies appear at random so the player never knows what is going to hapen next. Too many active and unreported anomalies means game over. Goal is to survive long enough (from 00:00 to 06:00 in game time). You will need sharp eyes and good memory to survive the entire night. The game contains psychological horror that mainly comes from making the player paranoid about what has changed in the house. There are also some scary monsters that might appear.

name: Land-io
description:
In Land-io, players claim territory by moving around, making trails, and enclosing plots of land to gain them as their own.

The goal is to have the most land claimed when game time runs out, but watch out for other players! If someone runs into your trail, you'll lose all the land you've collected."

The player with the most land at the end of the 5 minutes wins the game.

name: Letter League
description: Letter League is an Activity that we've developed here at Discord. Letter League is a game where you and your friends take turns placing letters on a shared game board to create words in a crossword-style. Spelling words with high earning letters and placing letters on special spaces earn players more points, so get your dictionaries and thesauri ready!

name: Morningstar
description: In this point-and-click adventure game your space ship crash-lands on a desolate planet. Your captain is wounded, your engineer: dead. You need to repair your vessel and solve the mystery of the planet to make it out of there alive.

name: SpellCast
description: Sin descripción

name: Jieitai World
description: Sin descripción

name: Jikki Pachi-Slot Simulator Vol. 1
description: Simulating the mechanics and rules of a pachislot machine, the game can be played in the strategy, battle or introductory modes. The player can choose from a selection of six different machine designs, which are based on real-life machines. The player configures the options token bets and paylines in a separate menu before playing the on the slot machine. Each slot row can be stopped at the press of a controller button.

name: Love Bites
description: Twelve dropdead gorgeous creatures that are hungry driven by animal instinct with only one desire, to quench their thrist.

name: Mahjong Kuru Jidai: AV Gal Seifukuhen
description: Adult FMV mahjong title for the 3DO, featuring the player's choice of girls/outfits for their opponents.

name: IAssociate
description:
iAssociate is a word association game where the players goal is to guess which words, or phrases, are associated to each other. At the start of every level you start off with just one word, or phrase, visible, and from that you have to figure out your way through the ever expanding level. For instance, a level might start you off with the word Fruits, from which there would be a number of associations. One of these might be Apple, which in turn could lead to words such as iPhone, Mac, The Big Apple, etc.

iAssociate is a re-brand/re-launch of Mercury Mind, a game released in April 2009.

name: The Dark Fables of Aesop
description: The Dark Fables of Aesop is a collection of twelve fables. The stories are presented with illustrations, animations and Jazz music. Included with the disk are 60 maze games with three different difficulties.

name: More Dark Fables from Aesop
description: Twelve more of Aesop's fables illustrate his enduring wit and wisdom, with narration by Danny Glover and music by Ron Carter. Thirty sliding puzzles reinforce the morals in a fun way.

name: IAssociate 2
description: The successor to the beloved brain game iAssociate is here with more than a facelift. iAssociate 2 has new kickass features and more challenging levels to drag you in!

name: Farcana
description:
Farcana is a third-person team ability shooter set in a mesmerizing Sci-Fi landscape. With its cutting-edge Unreal Engine 5 graphics, Farcana transports you to the awe-inspiring colonized Mars, where you will engage in heart-pounding 4x4 PvP combat matches across various game modes.

At its core, Farcana is a blend of gripping gameplay and eSports focus. Both players and spectators are bound to be drawn into its dynamic blend of action, strategy, and skill. Moreover, Farcana stands out with its innovative Bitcoin-backed prize system. Whether it's through cash boxes or tournament prizes, Farcana recognizes and rewards your dedication and prowess.

name: Funny Farm
description: Funny Farm is an online word association game played by linking related words on a large word map.

name: Duck Hunt Remake
description: A clone of Duck Hunt, popular classic NES game, for PSVITA/PSTV.

name: Silent Hope: Wanderer's Weapon & Item Set
description: A DLC pack that unlocks an exclusive weapon for the Wanderer, a Magistone for increased stun resistance, consumables that boost experience gain and a ruby worth 5000 runes.

name: World of JumpStart
description:
Are your little learners ready to embark on an enchanting journey through the World of JumpStart? Invite them to create and customize their very own Jumpee, settle into a friendly neighborhood, complete exciting missions, raise magical pets and more in an interactive and adventure-filled world where knowledge is key and learning is fun.

Play now to get started with Frankie and the JumpStart friends!

name: Bakeru
description: A 3D action game starring taiko drum-wielding tanuki boy Bakeru, who assumes the form of a human, going on a journey to save Japan from the clutches of a festival army led by the notorious Oracle Saitaro.

name: Jinsei Game for Nintendo Switch
description:
Create your own avatar, refine its parameters and grow yourself! The jobs you can get will change depending on the parameters!
There are various jobs, such as office workers and doctors, which automatically rank up if you meet certain conditions, and baseball players and idols, which rank up by successfully playing roulette.

name: The Secret of Donkey Island
description: The Secret of Donkey Island (Tajemství Oslího ostrova), is a point-and-click adventure game from 1994, and the first commercial Czech PC game. It’s a parody of Monkey Island that takes place shortly after the first two games. You play as Gajbraš Trípvůd, who must escape the island while on the run from LeChuk's brother, LeGek.

name: Powers
description:
Always knew you were special? Discover your inner power and become more than merely human.

Will it be fire... or ice? Light... or darkness? Mind Control... or Empathy?

Train your skills and do battle with other players from around the world. Discover your class and band together. Perhaps you'll be a Psychic, or a Shifter?

Earn experience through battles and if you're victorious, take your opponent's inner power by force, and claim it for your own. Learn to master it, and you too can wield it in battle.

You're not different... you're special.

name: Our Story in Spring
description:
Hana is a shy florist with a secret wish: to reinvent herself and experience more beyond life in the blossom-bathed village of Yamamori. There's just one small problem— hopelessly sheltered, she has never stepped foot outside the boundaries of the village before.

Meanwhile, those around Hana have flourished. Her best friend chased his dreams to the big city, and even her childhood bully returns to Yamamori a reformed man. Determined to be left behind no more, Hana steels her resolve, but it will take friendship, love, and more than a little courage to change on her own.

Drift across three tranquil springs in rural and urban Japan, and experience the tender tale of one young woman's budding desire to transform her future alongside the men who shaped her past.

name: Magic Wars
description:
Enter a world of wizards, spells, duels and dark magic. Follow the footsteps of Merlin, Gandalf and Harry Potter...

Will you cast an magic ice spell to freeze your enemy or trap them in a shadow vortex?

Good or evil?

Charms or dark curses?

Which path will you choose in Magic Wars?

name: The Elder Scrolls Renewal Morroblivion
description: Welcome to Morroblivion the godfather of The Elder Scrolls Renewal Projects! A community dedicated to recreating The Elder Scrolls III Morrowind GOTY into the more modern engine of Oblivion, complete with creatures, quests, voices and support for original Morrowind mods such as Tamriel Rebuilt.

name: V is for Vortex
description: V is for Vortex is a simple but addicting puzzle game. After waking up in a strange testing facility you find yourself thrust into a series of bizarre tests with only your wits, and a strange gun by your side. V is for Vortex ships with 18 fun levels that will challenge your mind and bend the rules of space. Can you beat every level?

name: Radirgy Noa
description: Radirgy Noa (also written as Radirgynoa) is a vertically scrolling shoot 'em up that was released in June 2009 for the Sega Naomi arcade platform by Milestone Inc. and the sequel to Radirgy. It was later released on February 25, 2010, in Japan for the Wii under the name Radirgy Noa Wii, distributed by LUCKY Co. LTD. It was also ported to the Xbox 360 on October 28, 2010, with new features, as Radirgy Noa Massive. A Microsoft Windows version was released on February 25, 2011, as part of the Milestone Sound Collection.

name: Radirgy Noa Wii
description: Radirgy Noa (also written as Radirgynoa) is a vertically scrolling shoot 'em up that was released in June 2009 for the Sega Naomi arcade platform by Milestone Inc. and the sequel to Radirgy. It was later released on February 25, 2010, in Japan for the Wii under the name Radirgy Noa Wii, distributed by LUCKY Co. LTD. It was also ported to the Xbox 360 on October 28, 2010, with new features, as Radirgy Noa Massive. A Microsoft Windows version was released on February 25, 2011, as part of the Milestone Sound Collection.

name: Radirgy 2
description: Radirgy 2 is the long-awaited sequel to the arcade-style shoot 'em up Radirgy, returning to its roots with classic vertical scrolling gameplay. Players choose between two ships, one with traditional controls and the other offering twin-stick mechanics.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Winter Solstice
description: A romhack for Zelda II.

name: Angelic Chaos Re-Boot!
description:
It began as a day just like any other.
A dull morning, an uneventful trip to school, an afternoon of tedious lectures...
And then I met her.

name: Shuwa no Mori
description: Sin descripción

name: Subátor
description: In the game, the main character Subátor must defeat a pencil sharpener that is upset. The story culminates in a duel on the refrigerator, which one needs to reach by jumping on crayons. Subátor is inspired by a little robot at the streamer fluffcz's.
